caption.p: Fresh weight and dry weight of P. bullata callus grown on WPM medium at different concentrations of ( a, b) NAA, ( c, d) IBA, ( e, f) IAA, ( g, h) 2,4-D, ( i, j) picloram and ( k, l) dicamba. Data represented as means ± SE. The asterisk (*) represents a significant difference of treated callus with 1-week old callus grown on WPM basal media without auxins (WPMO) at p ≤ 0.05 Tukey’s range test.
